text: I want to manipulate feed which contains frequently updated (with time) contents using feed parser.
Goal is to show all the contents of the updated feed.

code:
import feedparser
d = feedparser.parse("some URL")

print "Information of user" 
i = range(10)

for i in d:
    print d.entries[i].summary 

print " "

text: As parsing data is list, and list don't accept string as indices, it shows error

code:
File "F:\JavaWorkspace\Test\src\rss_parse.py", line 18, in <module>
print d.entries[i].summary 
TypeError: list indices must be integers

text: Then how can I get all contents?
can anyone please show me some light on this issue?
